shared.model

Class VictoryPointManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.VictoryPointManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VictoryPointManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An object that keeps track of how many victory points each player has. This way we keep points centralized and they're easier to track/change (especially longest road & largest army).
    Author:
    matthewcarlson, garrettegan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
